channel.title: F8-Fc on Victors drone builds
channel.description: Recent content in F8-Fc on Victors drone builds

item.title: Tiny golden brushed quadcopter
item.description: Utilizing f8 fc brushed AIO this build became quite neat! Components Component Details Amount Price each [$] Link Flight controller AIO f8 fc 1 20 Github Motor 8520 3.7V 4 2 AliExpress Propeller 65mm 4 0.6 AliExpress Battery connector BetaFPV BT2.0 1 0.6 AliExpress Dampers M3 4 0.15 AliExpress Carbon fiber tube 4x2mm (40cm total) 1 4 AliExpress ELRS Receiver BETAFPV ELRS Lite 2.4 1 15 AliExpress A part from the components above I have used 3D printed parts in PLA, epoxy, bolts & nuts.

item.title: f8 fc
item.description: The open-source brushed AIO flight controller for x8 drones. f8 fc is a fully open source flight controller that is made primarily for small drones with brushed drones. It features: STM32F405 microcontroller with 1MB flash BMI270 imu BMP388 barometer Onboard 16MB external flash for data logging Status LEDs 1-4s input voltage 4 available UARTs 8 brushed motor drives with 6A mosfets Voltage & current sensing Runs ardupilot How to flash Ardupilot Get ardupilot toolchain and put the hwdef.

item.title: The worlds smallest x8 drone with brushed motors
item.description: I’ve wanted to build a mini x8 drone with brushed motors for some time it’s finally time! Everything is first sketched and modelled in Fusion360. Project Goal Build a tiny x8 drone with brushed motors that can fly with Ardupilot. Components Component Details Amount Price each [$] Link Flight controller AIO f8 fc 1 20 Github Motor 8520 3.7V 8 2 AliExpress Propeller 65mm 8 0.6 AliExpress Battery connector BetaFPV BT2.
